name: File Knight
description:
File Knight is an experimental game played in the file explorer.  Right now, it's only playable on mac.  A windows version may or may not come to fruition. 

FEATURES:

– Talk to a senile old man who has some very important knowledge

– Do rewarding manual labor

- Fight a giant hand with some garden shears

- Look at some pots 

Estimated playtime: 30 minutes  

Dark Entity art by 000Fesbra000
